resources.string: You are a crazy beer-fanatic millionaire. Its the weekend. Your location is LONG/LAT. You have a perfect helicopter with enough fuel to fly 2000 kilometers.
You have an idea to visit as many beer factories within that distance as you can and collect as many beer types as you can for your party this weekend.
Program accepts following inputs: Home location (latitude, longitude) and Priority (breweries or beer types)
Program uses SQLite to run MySQL inside the Android App. Internet Connection is not Required.
